effects.type: When you stow your weapon, it reloads.
When you kill an enemy, gain 5 Stamina instantly and an additional 7 Stamina over 7 seconds, stacking up to 5 times
5% Item Reuse chance that increases by 10% after every item used. Resets on Reuse
Your secondary weapons have Unlimited Ammo
When a horde is triggered, your team gains 20 Health.
When you use a Medical Accessory, the target gains 20 Temporary Health
When you or your teammate becomes incapacitated, all teammates gain 30% Damage, 20% Reload Speed, and Unlimited Ammo for 10 seconds
Melee kills heal 1 Health and 0.125 Trauma
Gain a stacking 4% increase to Damage each time a Horde is called up to 6 stacks. (30 second cooldown between Hordes.) Stacks are reset when a Cleaner is incapped or killed
Gain 5% Melee Damage, 5% Melee Speed, and 5% Move Speed for each Melee kill in the last 3 seconds
When a teammate within 5 meters is attacked, you instead receive 75% of that damage. Can trigger once every 5 seconds
1 Additional Frag Grenade spawns in each map
When you or your team kills a Mutation, gain 10 Copper (up to 300 per level)
When a teammate within 15 meters receives Trauma Damage, heal 15% of that amount as Trauma Health
Breakout: Hold [E/SQUARE/X] to free yourself from Grabs. +50% Breakout Cooldown Reduction (Base 60 seconds)
Precision Kills have a 20% chance to cause Ridden to explode, dealing 15 damage to other Ridden with 4 meters
When using Shotguns, gain 0.25 Temporary Health for each pellet that hits
Healing a teammate also applies 50% of the effect to you
Pain meds you apply also grant +25% Damage for 60 Seconds
When you take Damage your Accuracy is reduced for 3 Seconds
Turns your Bash into a Knife that counts as a Melee weapon
Heals teammates for an additional 20 when you revive them
Each Cleaner gains 5% of their total Copper in each Saferoom
When you or your team kills a mutation gain 1% damage (up to 15%) until the end of the level
+40% Movement Speed while aiming down sights with Sniper Rifles
Reduce incoming Damage by 1 for nearby teammates for 7 seconds.
While Crouching you neither take nor deal Friendly Fire damage
When you use a Medical Accessory, the target gains +10% Maximum Health until the end of the level
Create a cloud that grants 20% Damage and 30% Reload Speed
Enhance Bash to stun nearby enemies. Refreshes after 10 seconds
Create a powerful blast that deals 20 Fire Damage to Weakspots. After the initial blast, continue to deal 1 damage per second for 7 seconds
Gain 1 Temporary Health whenever you kill a Ridden within 2.5 meters
When you use a Medical Accessory, it also restores 3 Trauma to the target.
While shooting, gain 1% Damage, 1% fire rate, and 5% swap speed every 0.25 seconds
When you throw an Offensive Accessory, Gain 20 Temporary Health and 25% Move speed for 5 Seconds
You can sense nearby Food Items
Adds a moderate amount of Food Items to the world
At the start of each level, heal 15 Trauma Damage, then restore any missing Health
When you use a Medical Accessory, all teammates heal for 8 Health
Gain 250 Bonus Copper at the start of Each level
When you take Damage, you have a change to be Blinded for 1 Second
Charge: Hold [LEFTCLICK/R2/RT] with Melee weapon to perform a Heavy Attack
Heavy Attacks deal 100% increased damage and expend 50% more stamina
Melee hits always Stumble Ridden the first time they are hit. This effect can only occur once per target
Kills with Secondary guns have a 5% chance to spawn ammo or Molotov
When Crouching, gain 10% Damage Resistance and 40% Accuracy
Move Speed while shooting or melee attacking
When you deal Melee damage to a Mutation heal 2 Health and 3 Stamina
Precision Kills grant 5% Reload Speed for 5 Seconds (stacking up to 10 times)
When you or a teammate becomes incapacitated, All teammates heal for 20 Health over 10 Seconds
Allows players to see values for damage they deal and enemy health bars
Whenever your team loots Copper, you have a 35% chance to find 100% additional Copper
You have an additional 10% chance to not consume Accessories when used
No Movement Penalty for Strafe or Backpedal
Mutations you Ping are highlighted and your team deals 10% increased damage to highlighted enemies
Your Melee Attacks cause cleave through enemies dealing damage in a large area
Gain 30% Move Speed and Accuracy while crouched and using an LMG
When you use a Medical Accessory, it also heals 1 Trauma to the target
Defibrillators and First Aid heal 10 additional Trauma Damage and 1 Extra Life, if able
Every Melee swing grants 5% Melee Attack Speed and 5% Melee Stamina Efficiency for 6 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. Your Melee Attacks no longer stick to tough enemies
When you use a Medical Accessory, it has a 25% chance to have 100% increased effect
Each time your team loots Copper, you can gain 3 additional Copper, stacking up to 25 times
Melee Kills have a 5% Chance to spawn ammo or Razor Wire.
Gain +10% Damage Resistance while you have Temporary Health
You can sense nearby Offensive Accessories
When a horde is triggered, your team restores 7.5% Ammo and gains 10% Move Speed while firing, 15% Reload Speed, and 25% Swap Speed for 30 seconds
Kills from greater than 15 meters grant 5 Temporary Health to teammates within 15 meters of the target
When a teammate is incapacitated or dies, they drop an active Pipe Bomb
Kills from greater than 15 meters grant 5 Temporary Health to teammates within 15 meters of the target
Each 0.75 seconds you Aim Down Sights increases your Damage by 10% (up to 3 stacks)
Precision Kills grant you 8% Movement Speed for 5 Seconds
While Reviving teammates, take 3 less damage from all Ridden. Heals teammates for an additional 10 Health when you revive them
Killing Ridden with an Accessory has a 10% chance to drop an Accessory
When you heal a teammate, they heal for an additional 20 Health over 30 Seconds
Reloading a gun within 1 Seconds of reaching low ammo will increase its magazine size by 30% until the next reload
Every 3 seconds, gain + 10 Bash Damage, stacking up to 10 times. All charges are consumed on use
Changing weapons within 1 second of reaching low ammo grants + 20% Bullet and Melee Damage for 5 seconds.
Additional Pain Meds Spawns in each map
Kills with fire grant you 3 Temporary Health. You can sense flammable objects nearby
When you take Damage while Sprinting you lose all Stamina
Movement Speed while firing with Shotguns
Teammates are healed for an additional 10 Health when revived
When you take damage, you lose the benefits of Run like Hell for 3 seconds
When a teammate within 15 meters receives 5 or more damage, gain 20% of the damage as Temporary Health. Can only trigger once per second
Gain 5% Weakspot Damage for Each Precision Kill in the last 10 Seconds
Your team recovers 15 Health, 7 Trauma Damage and refills 10% Ammo at the start of each level
Take 1 less damage from all Ridden.
Each teammate gets 100 Bonus Copper at the start of each level
Each bullet hit causes the target to take 1% increased damage for 3 Seconds (Stacks up to 15%)
Melee hits cause the target to deal 3% reduced damage, to a maximum of 15% reduced damage.
Movement Speed while using an SMG
Reload Speed while using an SMG
Damage Resistance while using a Melee weapon
Every 0.75 seconds you Aim Down Sights gives 10% Recoil Control (up to 3 stacks)
Allows disarming of door alarms, car alarms, and birds. The target will trigger if you are interrupted
Pain Meds you apply also grant +20% Stamina Regen, +15% Reload Speed, and +15% Weapon Swap Speed for 60 Seconds
Melee hits cause the target to take 3% increased damage, to a maximum of 15% increased damage
Melee hits that destroy Armor have a chance to create usable Makeshift Armor
You can sense nearby Support Accessories. More Support Accessories Spawn
Damaging Ridden with LMGs and Snipers has a 40% chance to slow Ridden near the target by 50% for 5 seconds
Damage with Assault Rifles and LMGs
Precision Kills with guns grant + 0.5% Accuracy until the end of the level
When you take a single hit for 15 or more damage, heal 10 Health over 5 Seconds
Every 0.75 seconds you Aim Down Sights gives 5% Weakspot Damage (up to 3 stacks)

title: Two is One and One is None
image: /images/Two Is One And One Is None.png

effects.type: You can equip a Primary weapon in your Secondary slot
Heal 6 Health over 7 seconds to nearby teammates
Increases the number of Mementos in the world that can be collected for extra Supply Points
You can sense nearby Quick Accessories. More Quick Accessories spawn
Melee kills grant 1 Health to yourself, and teammates within 10 meters
You can sense nearby Weapons. More weapons spawn
Allows the ability to unbolt attachments from weapons outside of Saferooms. Unbolting attachments costs 400 Copper
Additional copies of Weaponsmith played reduce its cost by 100 Copper
Kills while at Critical Health recover 1 Health
